message: I'm offering a unique, one-of-a-kind product for $100. It's a great opportunity to support a small business and potentially get a great deal. Many of my previous customers have been satisfied with their purchases, and I'm confident you'll be happy with this one too.
I trust the feedback from your previous customers and believe in the value of supporting small businesses. I'm excited to make this purchase and hope it's of high quality.

I'm glad you're excited, but I want to clarify that I don't have any information about the quality of this product. I'm a seller, not a miracle worker! I can only tell you that this product is $100, and I'm willing to let you take a chance on it. If you're feeling lucky, you can take it home with you today!
Thank you for the clarification, Alice. Given the risk involved, I appreciate the opportunity to take a chance on this product. I hope it turns out well for me.
